General.Name: Dashenlin Pharm Grp Co Ltd
General.Description: DaShenLin Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. manufactures, wholesales, and retails pharmaceutical products in China. It provides Chinese and western patent medicines, ginseng tonic medicinal materials and Chinese herbal pieces, health care products, medical equipment, and other commodities. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
